title: Anime Fansub Documentary
description:
F I L E I N F O

> SiZE.......[ 268 MB 

Screenshots:

A controversial \"docu-rant\" on the rise and (mainly) fall of anime fan subtitles.

Professional translator/amateur artist & animator Paul \"Otaking\"Johnson presents a half an hour \"documentary\" on the controversial subject of anime fan subtitles.  With academic research and quotes from famous names in translation theory, Johnson attempts to explain why anime fansubs started out great and turned into pure crapola. Featuring hand-drawn animation and a full opening sequence by the so-called \"Otaking\" himself, this has caused quite the flame war online. Now, experience the rage at full resolution!
